title: Bug 2529[Navigator] Open/Close project not always available (1GFKW5S)
description: Bug 2529[Navigator] Open/Close project not always available (1GFKW5S) Now selectboth P1 and P2.
OB: When selecting both P1 and P2, the Open/Close project option is not always available.
EB: The Open/Close project option should be available either when selecting both P1 and P2 or when selecting neither of them.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Select both P1 and P2.
2. Observe the availability of the Open/Close project option.
